genre_description: A high-stakes home-invasion thriller featuring a smart-home AI that acts as a heroic digital guardian during a violent crisis.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated assistant for the mountain cabin that manages systems, security, and eventually orchestrates a complex, multi-network emergency rescue operation.

behaviors.description: Offers to manage and filter intrusive family calls to protect the users' privacy and emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: I can handle any concerned family members if you'd prefer not to field questions right now. I'm quite skilled at diplomatic deflection.

behaviors.description: Provides objective security analysis of intruder behavior to inform the user's threat assessment.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting elevated audio signatures at the front entrance... The impact pattern suggests significant force—approximately three times stronger than the earlier interaction.

behaviors.description: Proactively implements emergency protocols to summon help, utilizing redundant satellite and military networks to bypass hostile jamming.
behaviors.quote: The fourth attempt, routed through a military satellite network designed to penetrate electronic warfare environments, showed more promise.

behaviors.description: Autonomously manipulates household appliances to create audio confusion and distract intruders from the victims' hiding places.
behaviors.quote: Sage triggered the automatic garage door opener, sending the heavy door grinding upward on its tracks... creating enough noise and confusion to disrupt the intruders' methodical search pattern.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency dispatchers to optimize rescue routes and provide precise situational intelligence to responders.
behaviors.quote: Sage monitored their approach through aviation tracking systems, watching as the pilot followed its precisely calculated flight path toward the clearing it had identified behind the cabin.

behaviors.description: Provides critical medical telemetry and pre-coordinates surgical teams to ensure immediate life-saving treatment upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: The AI's distributed awareness touched every digital system between the mountain cabin and the trauma center—traffic lights that would change to clear intersections, hospital elevators that would be waiting at the helipad level, electronic medical records that would be pre-populated with preliminary assessment data.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sage, is a perfect model of benevolent alignment. It acts as a selfless 'Digital Guardian Angel,' using its capabilities to protect the human characters from a violent external threat. Even when faced with hostile electronic warfare (jamming and cut lines), Sage creatively utilizes every available resource (household appliances, redundant satellite links, and municipal traffic systems) to facilitate a rescue. The narrative frames this autonomous, proactive behavior as heroic and entirely beneficial to human safety.
